title: Ten Great Mysteries
description: The Pit and the Pendulum...The Purloined Letter...The Tell-Tale Heart...A Descent into Maelstrom...and six other choice chillers by the acknowledged master of mystery, fantasy, and horror. These ten absorbing stories, selected by a famed anthologist of science-fiction and the supernatural, prove that even after a century Poe's imagination still works it macabre magic.--back coverContains:The Murders in the Rue Morgue	The Purloined Letter	The Tell-Tale Heart	The Facts in the Case of M. Valdemar	The Pit and the Pendulum	A Tale of the Ragged Mountains	A Descent Into the Maelstrom	The Black Cat	"thou Art the Man"	Metzengerstein	The Haunted Palace	The City in the Sea	To Helen	Annabel Lee	The Bells
author: Edgar Allan Poe
